project.title: Mixed
project.description: Mixed is an interactive, avant-garde experiment touching on the topics of diversity, racism, and interracial relationships. Navigate around in an abstract space, mixing with different colors to create AI-controlled players. Explore the effects of cultural diversity and see how diversity is (im)balanced in the world. What impact can you leave on the world?
project.description_short: Mixed is an interactive, avant-garde experiment touching on the topics of diversity, racism, and interracial relationships. Navigate around mixing with different colors to create AI-controlled players. Explore the effects of cultural diversity and see how diversity is (im)balanced in the world.
